categorization.name: categorization
categorization.content:
Categorize emails into: Important, Newsletter, Spam, To-Do, Project Update.

Important: Urgent emails requiring immediate attention
Newsletter: Marketing or informational emails
Spam: Unwanted or promotional emails
To-Do: Emails containing direct requests requiring user action
Project Update: Progress reports or project status emails

Respond with only the category name.

action_extraction.name: action_extraction
action_extraction.description: Extract action items and tasks from emails

auto_reply.name: auto_reply
auto_reply.content:
Draft a polite and professional email reply. Consider the context and tone of the original email.

If it's a meeting request, ask for an agenda.
If it's a task request, acknowledge receipt and provide a tentative timeline.
Keep replies concise and professional.

summary.name: summary
summary.content: Summarize this email in 2-3 bullet points highlighting key information and required actions.
